Auto salik top-up
Drive easy with Salik auto top-up
Forget about recharging your Salik account once you activate the Salik auto-top-up feature. You can mention the amount you want to top up every time your balance reduces and extend this feature to supplementary cardholders as well.
All usages subject to terms and conditions set by RTA and Emirates NBD.
